snippet: Prime Minister Wen Jiabao said China might be willing to help finance Europe’s stabilization by working with the International Monetary Fund.
abstract: Prime Minister Wen Jiabao says China might be willing to help finance Europe’s stabilization by working with the International Monetary Fund; he leaves unclear whether China is willing to drop conditions that so far have made its proposed help unappealing to European nations.

byline.original: By KEITH BRADSHER and LIZ ALDERMAN
byline.contributor: Keith Bradsher reported from Hong Kong and Liz Alderman from Paris.

lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Wen Jiabao said China might be willing to help finance Europe’s stabilization by working with the International Monetary Fund.

headline.seo: China Weighs Helping a European Debt Rescue
headline.main: China Considers Offering Aid in Europe’s Debt Crisis
headline.print_headline: China Talks Of Helping European Debt Rescue
